experience.title: Student Teacher
responsibilities: Designed and delivered daily lesson plans for Algebra I and Geometry to classes of 25+ students, ensuring alignment with state curriculum standards.
Facilitated small-group instruction and individual tutoring sessions to support students with diverse learning needs and IEP requirements.
Integrated educational technology, including interactive whiteboards and Google Classroom, to enhance student engagement and track performance data.
Participated in parent-teacher conferences and departmental meetings to discuss student progress and curriculum development.

experience.title: Teaching Intern
responsibilities: Assisted lead teachers in the Social Studies department with grading, classroom management, and material preparation.
Observed varied instructional strategies and implemented scaffolding techniques for English Language Learners (ELL).
Supervised after-school study halls and provided academic support across multiple subjects.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
